name: TALOYA 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Led Light Remote Control Flush Mount Low Profile for Bedroom Farmhouse Patio Outdoor Living Room Kitchen Dining Room,DC Motor,Reversible,Black
short_description: Ceiling Fan & LED Light in One:The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control is both a ceiling fan and a super bright LED light in one unit,so you can illuminate and circulate air around your room without spending for two different products.Fan or light can work simultaneously or separately
Buzzer ON,OFF:The Buzzer of The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control can be turned on and off through the remote control

Modern Design & High Quality:The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control is made of high quality ABS material and stainless steel,which is strong and durable.The waterproof design of the fan body can effectively protect the internal structure from rain and dust.It is suitable for any indoor and covered outdoor space,such as:Outdoor,Living Room,Bedroom,Farmhouse,Patio,Kitchen,Dining Room,etc

6 Speed Reversible Quiet DC Motor:The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control has a 6 speed reversible quiet DC motor. In the summer,the forward mode allows air to flow downward and keep you cool.Less than 30 decibels of sound for a comfortable sleeping environment.In the winter,the reverse mode allows air to flow upward so that the warm air produced by the room's heating equipment is evenly distributed throughout the room.It has 6 adjustable wind speeds

3CCT Adjustable LED CEILING LIGHT:The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control comes with a round 15W LED light that measures 6.7 inches in diameter.There are 3 color temperatures to choose from(3000K warm yellow light,4500K natural light,6000K cool white light). You can easily adjust the color temperature of the light by using the included remote control when you are partying, working or resting.LED light sources are more energy-efficient and have a longer lifespan

Light Memory Function & Timer Setting:When you set the color temperature of the light you like,turn off the power for more than 15 seconds,the next time you turn on the power,it will be the state you have set.The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control has a timer function (1,2,4 hours for selection)

Easy To Install:The overall design of The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control is simple and practical,and most of the complex installation procedures are already completed with detailed installation instructions.Note:this model is not suitable for use in an environment exposed to rain and sunlight

Multifunctional remote control:With this remote control,you can easily adjust the color temperature of the light and the speed of The 52 Inch Ceiling Fan with Light and Remote Control anywhere in the room

After-Sale Service:If you have any questions,please contact us.Our Friendly Customer Service will reply within 24 hours.(Tip: Find our ceiling fans from your order and click on the Customer Support button)

name: 52 Inch Ceiling Fans with Lights and Remote, Black Ceiling Fan with 5 Blades, 6 Speed Reversible DC Motor, 3CCT Dimmable LED, Modern Design for Bedroom, Living room & Covered Outdoor,Includes Downrod
short_description: 【Modern Design & Versatile Use】This 52-inch Rayqueen ceiling fan features a minimalist modern design, perfect for any home decor. With dual-sided blades (Matte Black and Wood Grain), it complements various interior styles. Its medium size and low-profile design make it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, garages, and even covered outdoor spaces like patios.

【Bright & Energy-Efficient Lighting】Equipped with a 24W LED (2000LM), this ceiling fan illuminates your home with 3 adjustable color temperatures (3000K/4500K/6000K) and dimmable brightness (20%-100%). The energy-efficient LED light provides bright, customizable lighting while reducing power consumption.

【Ultra-Quiet & Powerful DC Motor】The 6-speed reversible DC motor ensures ultra-quiet operation (below 32dB) and powerful airflow (up to 4119 CFM). Perfect for all seasons, it offers cooling airflow in summer and warm air circulation in winter, enhancing your home's comfort year-round.

【Convenient Remote Control 】The included remote control allows you to adjust fan speed (1-6 levels), light brightness, and color temperature with ease. Enjoy added convenience with a 1/3/6-hour timer, sleep mode, and reversible airflow function for optimal air circulation in any season.

【Modular Design & Long-Term Convenience】 All key components (fan blades, light cover, LED light, and remote) are replaceable for extended use. Features plug-in modules and simple blade assembly (basic tools required; installation video provided). ETL-certified for safety and backed by 24/7 support—contact us via Amazon Message for replacements, spare parts, or repair assistance.

name: Honeywell Ceiling Fans Glen Alden, 52 Inch Classic Flush Mount Indoor LED Ceiling Fan with Light, Pull Chain, Quick-2-Hang Dual Finish Blades, Reversible Motor - 50182 (Brushed Nickel)
short_description: Keep Cool With The Correct Ceiling Fan Size — For ultimate performance, choose the best ceiling fan size for your room; This 52-in ceiling fan is ideal for medium to large rooms up to 400 sq. ft. such as bedrooms, dens, dining rooms, & more

Modern Blades to Suit Your Home — This Glen Alden 5-blade room fan provides ultimate airflow; These fan blades deliver maximum circulation at high speed & offer a bold body & dual-finish wood finish options
Flush Mount Ceiling Fan — Chic low profile design built for rooms with low ceilings or where extra space is needed

Crafted With High-Quality Material — The high-capacity motor delivers powerful airflow & quiet performance for years to come; This durable & modern ceiling fan is designed for long lasting comfort; ETL listed

Reversible Fan For All Seasons — Improves air circulation in winter & summer; During summer, this ceiling fan optimizes airflow to enhance comfort; During winter, change the direction to evenly distribute warm air on low speed
product_description: Honeywell ceiling fans make your home comfortable in summer (and winter) as well as help to reduce energy costs. Enjoy the welcome breeze in any room of your home while looking stylish. This transitional ceiling fan combines stylish details with contemporary influences for a truly inspiring fixture for your home. Featuring frosted glass shades with a 4-arm branch style lighting The innovative 5-blade design provides ultra-efficient, adjustable and energy efficient airflow while the LED lights provide ideal lighting for the area. Control your ceiling fan with the traditional pull chain. Enjoy year-round comfort by adjusting the reversible airflow switch that easily allows you to change the direction of the fan to properly distribute air. During hot summer months it will provide a cooling effect or when reversed, spreading warm air in the winter to help reduce energy costs. Specifications: Sizing: 52-in 5-blade indoor fan for rooms up to 400 sq. ft. Lighting: 4x A15 / E12 light bulbs included that provide 600 lumens, 6.5 watts, 3000k color temperature. No-light cap included for using this fan without the light kit. About Honeywell Ceiling Fans Honeywell Ceiling Fans features a collection of fans in various sizes and specifications to ensure your choice of indoor or outdoor fan delivers optimum performance for your room's size. You can trust the quality of Honeywell Ceiling Fans to deliver maximum airflow and a stylish lighting option. Honeywell Ceiling Fans use high-quality materials that are long lasting and durable to deliver a great look and last for years to come.
